title: Manifold Learning on Handwritten Digits
description: In this lab, we will explore various manifold embedding techniques on the digits dataset. We will use different techniques to embed the digits dataset, plot the projection of the original data onto each embedding, and compare the results obtained from different embedding methods.

meta.title: Manifold Learning on Handwritten Digits
meta.description: Explore various manifold embedding techniques on the digits dataset and compare the results.
meta.keywords: machine learning, dimensionality reduction, handwritten digits, data visualization, scikit-learn, manifold learning, scikit-learn playground
